participant_1.background:
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
i love dogs.
i am a ballet dancer.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
I hope my friends and family are doing well.
i have four siblings.

content.text: Hello! My name is participant_1.  How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you. My name is participant_2.
It is nice to meet you.  I am a ballet dancer.  Do you have any hobbies?
I do!  I have a dog named Max.  He is a great companion.
I love dogs!  I have a dog named Percy.  He's a big goofball.
I bet Percy is a good friend.  I love going on walks with my dog.  It's a great way to get exercise.
I agree!  It's also a great way to relax and spend time with your pet.
I'm glad you have a dog.  They're great companions.
I'm glad I do too.  They make life more fun.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to knit.  It's a great way to relieve stress.
I've never tried knitting.  Is it hard to learn?
It's not too bad.  There are a lot of resources online that can help you get started.
I might have to give it a try.  It sounds like something I would enjoy.
I think you would like it.  It's a great way to be creative and make something beautiful.
I'm sure I would.  I love making things.
I'm glad you're interested.  I'm happy to teach you how to knit.
That would be great!  I would love to learn.
We can start next time we talk.
Sounds good.  I'm looking forward to it.
